entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
